column3: School of Sport and Health Sciences
column5: MSc Food Safety Management at UCLan provides a fascinating and comprehensive focus on important areas of HACCP auditing, foodborne disease, food safety hazards and the effective management of food safety. This course is aimed at individuals in the food industry, enforcement and education who wants to develop their knowledge and skills in a food safety career.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
